name: Yuri_Stonelaw
content: Yuri Stonelaw was a resident of the planet Vernet. He was the son of Arn and Emmi Stonelaw, the brother of Kristoff, and the foster brother of Mair Koda. After the Empire arrived on Vernet and conscripted Kristoff, Yuri resolved to rescue him. Enlisting Koda's help when she returned to Vernet after a trading run, the pair infiltrated the Imperial base and tried to rescue their brother. However, Kristoff was indoctrinated by the Empire and unwilling to leave, forcing Yuri and Koda to flee the planet.
